wxPropertyGridState Class Reference

#include <propgrid.h>

Inheritance diagram for wxPropertyGridState:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Contains information of a single wxPropertyGrid page.

Generally you should not use this class directly, but instead methods in wxPropertyContainerMethods, wxPropertyGrid, wxPropertyGridPage, and wxPropertyGridManager.
